cause.description:
1. Helping to build awareness of Global Warming and its Affects.
2. Develope plans and courses of action to help Aid in the reversal of Global Warming.
3. Help Unite people world wide against the destruction of many species natural habitats.
4. Create a network in which we can communicate and share our idea's.
1. Global Warming Can and Must Be Stopped.
2. The exhausting of out natural resources must be stopped.
cause.name: Actions Speak Louder Than Words
